title: What's the best way to make donation to help people involved in "Odisha Train Accident" ?
selftext:
Saw this Donatekart donation campaign [https://www.donatekart.com/Donatekart/Help-Odisha-TrainAccident-Victims](https://www.donatekart.com/Donatekart/Help-Odisha-TrainAccident-Victims) Not sure if it's genuine and the donation will really reach the right people or will get consumed by NGOs people.

Anyone having info about donatekart to confirm this or any other donation campaign ?
